title: Sample, "#3682 Negative Reverse Facets", 2008–09
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: appliquéd on knitted jersey, embroidered in running and knotted stitches
Label: knitted cotton, appliquéd with metallic printed cotton, embroidered in running and knotted stitches
description: Sample of white jersey appliquéd with metallic silver printed jersey in a pattern of large and small flower heads. Petals are secured to the foundation using a running stitch and are secured with knots. Knots are trimmed with excess thread remaining to form a surface texture.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, "#3682 Negative Reverse Facets", 2008–09. Medium: cotton
Technique: appliquéd on knitted jersey, embroidered in running and knotted stitches
Label: knitted cotton, appliquéd with metallic printed cotton, embroidered in running and knotted stitches. Gift of Alabama Chanin. 2010-13-1-i.
